forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 49. North wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the night drapes its velvet curtain over Downtown San Francisco, a serene clarity settles in, punctuated by the glimmer of city lights against the canvas of darkness. Tonight, temperatures will gently descend to a mild 49, with a whispering north wind that barely rustles the leaves. The air is crisp, holding the very essence of winter's embrace while remaining distinctly San Franciscan—inviting yet cool.

Tomorrow promises to dawn with the warmth of the sun, wrapping the city in a soft, golden glow. Expect a pleasant day with a peak temperature that will hover around 63 before easing into the cooler afternoon, where a touch of the marine layer may kiss the views from the Bay Bridge to the Pacific. Dress in layers: a light sweater or jacket will suffice to chase away any lingering chill. This is the perfect weather to take a relaxed stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps stopping to savor a warm coffee at a local café, or indulge in the vibrant arts scene that seems to pulse through the streets at every turn. The day beckons for quiet enjoyment, an opportunity to embrace the beauty of the moment as the city vibrates quietly beneath the shifting skies.
